name: 蕭郁達
objective:
本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.
schedule:
Week 1: Physical Property Methods, Parameters and Data
Week 2: Basics of Process Flowsheet Simulation
Week 3: Simulation of Heat Exchangers
Week 4: Simulation with Model Analysis Tools
Week 5: Simulation of Separators and Columns
Week 6: Simulation of Chemical Reactors
Week 7: Simulation of Chemical Plants (Progress Report)
Week 8: Process Design, Integration and Economics
Week 9: Midterm Proposal
Week 10: Process Design Workshop
Week 11: Process Design Workshop (Progress Report)
Week 12: Process Design Workshop
Week 13: Process Design Workshop (Progress Report)
Week 14: Process Design Workshop
Week 15: Process Design Workshop (Progress Report)
Week 16: Process Design Workshop
Week 17: Process Design Workshop (Progress Report)
Week 18: Final Report
scorePolicy:
Assignments (10%): in-class worksheets
Progress Reports (30%): biweekly written reports, calculation sheets
Midterm Proposal (10%): written report, calculation sheets, oral presentation
Final Report (50%): written report, calculation sheets, oral presentation, e-poster, simulation files
materials:
Self-made materials

Seider, W. D., Seader, J. D., Lewin, D. R. (2003). Product and Process Design Principles: Synthesis, Analysis and Evaluation. Wiley.

Towler, G., Sinnott, R. (2021). Chemical Engineering Design: Principles, Practice and Economics of Plant and Process Design. Butterworth-Heinemann.

Aspen Plus Unit Operation Models. Aspen Technology, Inc.
